forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 17. West northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 26. West northwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 18. West northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely after 7am. Cloudy, with a high near 28. East wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of blowing snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 12. Wind chill values as low as -5. West wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Blowing Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow before 7am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 21. Wind chill values as low as -2. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 9. West wind 0 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 24. South wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of blowing snow and scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 10. Wind chill values as low as -7. West wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow and scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 20. Wind chill values as low as -4. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated snow showers before 7pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 9, with temperatures rising to around 11 overnight. West wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of around one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Snow Showers Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 24. Southeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 6, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/8 and 2/9.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Fast machine groomed. Good deep double tracked for classic. Red Toko worked better than my skins. Skating also was fast and easy.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: This morning’s  snow  was the icing on the cake over a well layered and constructed base . Beautiful groom - well done Nubs crew ! LF 7

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 6 lifts, Space Worm and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Monday morning, and are in great shape.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Update: Due to high wind speeds affecting lift safety, Nub’s Nob terrain and league racing activities are canceled for the evening session of February 6, 2025.
